summary: The Deepwater Horizon rig, owned by Transocean and operated by BP, suffered a deadly explosion in the Gulf of Mexico on April 20, 2010. An unstoppable fire led to the rig's collapse two days later, causing a massive oil spill. This was the biggest marine oil spill in history. The rig, built in 2001, had previously drilled the deepest oil well in 2009. The disaster claimed 11 lives and had a significant environmental impact.
title: Deepwater Horizon
